entries.journal_entry_description: An executive from the mining corporation has hired you to deal with some striking miners.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: An executive from the mining corporation has hired you to destroy the power generator at the striking mining facility in the North West of the continent. The first step is to tear out the cables surrounding the power core of the machine.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You need to remove the power core from the generator.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Head back to the new mining facility and show the power core to the executive.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: You have decided to help the striking miners. Return to the new mining facility and upload the proof against the corrupt executive in to their information network.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Return to the striking miners leader and let him know that it's done.
